One important thing to keep in mind while searching for assistance is to be mindful of the cultural differences and be sensitive to the refugees and immigrants' experiences. Here are some additional tips that can help you when looking for assistance:

1. Respect their cultural identity: Be respectful and sensitive to the refugees and immigrants' cultural and religious beliefs. 2. Understand their language and communication barriers: Speak slowly and clearly, and use simple terms when communicating with them. 3. Be patient: Recognize that adapting to a new environment can be challenging and take time. 4. Promote inclusiveness and diversity: Work towards building a welcoming community that values diversity and promotes inclusiveness. 5. Be mindful of trauma and mental health: Understand that refugees and immigrants may have experienced significant trauma and mental health issues and require access to relevant resources. By being mindful of these points, you can help create a safe and supportive environment for refugees and immigrants in Brindisi.
